reasoning: Umbrella term including ADPKD (dominant) and ARPKD (recessive). Prevalence more appropriate than incidence for genetic conditions. ADPKD prevalence ~1 in 2,500 (40 per 100k). Using prevalence as these are lifelong genetic conditions.
source: Torres VE et al. (2007). Autosomal dominant polycystic kidney disease. Lancet. 369(9569):1287-301
